name: MonkApiDescribe
description: Get schema information and metadata about database tables. Returns detailed schema structure including column names, data types, constraints, relationships, indexes, and tracking configuration. When called without parameters, lists all available schemas in the current tenant. When called with a specific schema name, returns comprehensive metadata for that schema including all columns and their properties. Use this to understand the database structure before performing data operations, to discover available schemas, or to understand column-level tracking configuration for audit trails. Requires authentication. Essential for exploratory analysis and understanding the data model.

schema.description: Schema name (optional - omit to list all schemas)
